definition: natural conditions and social customs of a place/local conditions
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: She’s learning the world person by person and place by place.
sentences.chinese: 她在瞭解世界各地的風土人情。

sentences.english: Japanese culture as a tree, its roots deep plunge in Japan on weekday. After thousands of years of absorption, improve and consolidate.
sentences.chinese: 日本文化如同一棵樹，它的根深扎於日本國的風土上。

sentences.english: In addition to the Terroir, grape varieties used also affect the styles of wines in Medoc .
sentences.chinese: 風土以外，葡萄品種也會影響梅鐸裏葡萄酒的風格。

sentences.english: This book, "A General Survey of North America", introduces local conditions and customs of the US in detail.
sentences.chinese: 這本《北美概觀》詳細地介紹了美國的風土人情。

sentences.english: Ask questions about the food as well as the culture and customs.
sentences.chinese: 多聊聊食物之外，還可以暢談中國文化和風土人情。

sentences.english: She put together a PowerPoint presentation on the people and culture of Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 她用幻燈片展示了越南的風土人情。

sentences.english: Especially from the wine flavor, often passing the origin of the endemic land features.
sentences.chinese: 特別是從酒的風味中，常傳遞着原產土地的風土特色。

sentences.english: Do you want to experience the customs in countryside with overseas students?
sentences.chinese: 你想和留學生一同領略鄉間的風土人情嗎？

sentences.english: This idea is most useful when contrasted with the term endemic.
sentences.chinese: 這個概念總是被用來與風土病比較。

sentences.english: The scenery and people on this side were very different from those in her village.
sentences.chinese: 這邊的風土人情與她村裏的大不相同。

definition: prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
copious/plentiful (of water)/surging (of waves)/refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3]/fig. majestic
mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
thought-provoking/worth thinking over/to provide food for thought
